{{Infobox TV channel | name = Disney Channel Poland | logofile = | logosize = | launch = December 02, 2006, 17:00 ([[UTC+1]]) | share = 0.79% | share as of = 2008 | share source = <ref>{{cite news|url=http://www.wirtualnemedia.pl/article/2587184_W_2008_roku_widzow_stracily_telewizje_ogolnopolskie_-__liderem_spadku_TVP_Info.htm|title=W 2008 roku widzÃ³w straciÅy telewizje ogÃ³lnopolskie - liderem spadku TVP Info|date=January 5, 2008|publisher=Wirtualnemedia.pl}}</ref> | owner = [[The Walt Disney Company]] | sister names = [[Disney XD (Poland)|Disney XD]], [[Disney Junior (Poland)|Disney Junior]] | web = http://www.disneychannel.pl | terr serv 1 = | terr chan 1 = | sat serv 1 = [[Cyfra+]] | sat chan 1 = 114 | sat serv 2 = Cyfrowy Polsat | sat chan 2 = 66 | sat serv 3 = [[N (Poland)|n]] | sat chan 3 = 90 | sat serv 4 = Neostrada TP z telewizjÄ | sat chan 4 = 50 | sat serv 5 = Telewizja na kartÄ | sat chan 5 = 14 | cable serv 1 = Vectra | cable chan 1 = 406 | cable serv 2 = ASTER | cable chan 2 = 42 }} '''Disney Channel Poland''' is an edition of the [[The Walt Disney Company]]-owned [[Disney Channel]] broadcasting to [[Poland]]. In Poland there are also available [[Disney XD (Poland)|Disney XD]] and [[Disney Junior (Poland)|Disney Junior]].
== History == The Channel started on December 2, 2006 at 17:00 (GMT+1) with film [[The Incredibles]]. It was started with Disney shows: ''[[American Dragon: Jake Long]]'', ''[[Brandy and Mr. Whiskers]]'', ''[[Kim Possible]]'', ''[[Lilo & Stitch: The Series]]'', ''[[The Emperor's New School]]'', ''[[Walt Disney Cartoon Classics|Classic Cartoons]]'', ''[[Fillmore!]]'', ''[[Goof Troop]]'', ''[[House of Mouse]]'', ''[[Lloyd in Space]]'', ''[[Recess (TV series)|Recess]]'', ''[[The Buzz on Maggie]]'', ''[[The Legend of Tarzan]]'', ''[[Quack Pack]]'', ''[[Hannah Montana]]'', ''[[Boy meets world]]'', ''[[Phil of the Future]]'', ''[[Smart Guy]]'', ''[[That's So Raven]]'', ''[[The Suite Life of Zack & Cody]]'' and Nickelodeon show ''[[The Fairly OddParents]]''. Soon, the channel had got many films, new shows, programs and [[Disney Channel Games]]. On May 1, 2011 the channel changed logo.

==Programming Blocks== ===Disney Junior=== {{main|Disney Junior Poland}} Disney Junior block broadcasts from 6 a.m. till 8 a.m. [[UTC+1]]

===Film Time! Block=== Film Time! block show Disney Animation Movies, Disney Channel Original Movies, and non-Disney movies. ===[[Disney Channel Games]]=== Debuting in 2006, the Disney Channel Games includes stars from Disney Channel Original Series and Movies, and were telecast from the Wide World of Sports Complex at Walt Disney World in Orlando, Florida. After the kick-off Games in 2006, the 2007 and 2008 Games included Disney Channel stars from across the world, making room for the addition of a Yellow Team (Added to Blue, Red and Green) during the 2007 event. In 2008, the games featured four teams: the Cyclones, the Comets, the Lightning and the Inferno. 2008 was the last DC Games to date; the Disney Channel Games were not held in 2009 nor in 2010. The Disney channel games 2007 was aired in the Fall of 2007. And the 2008 games were aired on August 19, 2008.
===Happy Easter Block=== In April 2009 Disney Channel showed movies every day during [[Easter]], including the premiere of ''[[Sleeping Beauty (1959 film)|Sleeping Beauty]]''; added ''[[Wizards of Waverly Place]]'' season 2 episodes to the Saturday morning lineup; and changed its look, temporarily, to a [[spring (season)|spring]] and Easter theme.
===Demi & Selena Block=== One day before the premiere of the movie [[Princess Protection Program]] the Demi & Selena block aired from 1 p.m. [[GMT]] (4 p.m. [[KSA]]) until 6 p.m. [[GMT]] (9 p.m. [[KSA]]). In this block all programming at that time that aired included [[Demi Lovato]] and [[Selena Gomez]]. Two [[Hannah Montana]] episodes aired that had Selena as a guest-star, A [[Suite Life of Zack and Cody]] episode that Selena guest starred in, [[As the Bell Rings (United States)]] episodes that Demi starred in, [[Camp Rock]] that Demi also starred in, the premiere of the second show of [[Studio DC: Almost Live]] that both Demi and Selena starred in, and a couple of [[Wizards of Waverly Place]] episodes that Selena starred in. The channel also changed its look temporarily to match the theme colors of the movie.
===Wiz-tober Block=== Disney Channel, and throughout October, 2009, premiered [[Wizards of Waverly Place: The Movie]], showed new episodes of [[Wizards of Waverly Place]], and showed special airings of [[Twitches (film)|Twitches]] & [[Twitches Too]]. On October 31, 2009, Disney Channel aired [[Halloween]] episodes of all shows. The channel also changed its look, temporarily, to a [[Magical]] logo.
===Wizards Vs. Vampires Block=== Starting October 26 , 2009 till October 29 , 2009 Disney Channel aired the 4 episodes of Wizards Vs. Vampires, in [[Wizards of Waverly Place]].
===Joyful December Block=== Disney Channel, and throughout December 2009, premiered [[Wizards on Deck with Hannah Montana]] & [[A Modern Twain Story: The Prince and the Pauper]], and run "back-to-back" episodes of selected shows. Also, Disney Channel ME traditionally aired [[Mickey's Twice upon a Christmas]] and [[The Muppet Christmas Carol]] on [[Christmas Eve]] & [[Christmas Day]]. The channel aired "Christmas specials & episodes" of its shows. The channel also changed its look, temporarily, to a [[Christmas]], [[Winter]] and [[North Pole]] look.
===Camp Rock block=== On 18 October 2010, there was a premiere of the second season of [[Jonas L.A.]] (two new episodes), [[Hannah Montana Forever]] (two new episodes) and ''[[Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam]]''.
===October-Takeover block=== On October 16, October 23 and on October 30, 2011 Disney Channel aired new episodes of the series ''[[Wizards of Waverly Place]]''. Also, on October 30, it aired films ''[[Halloweentown (film)|Halloweentown]]'' and ''[[Halloweentown II: Kalabar's Revenge]] next day.
===Brothers-And-Sisters-Block=== On November 27, 2010, Disney Channel aired a special block filled with special episodes from the Disney channel original series''[[Wizards of Waverly place]]'', ''[[Hannah Montana]]'', ''[[Jonas]]'', ''[[Jonas L.A.]]'', ''[[The Suite Life on Deck]]'', ''[[Phineas and Ferb]]'' and others. There was also the premiere of Disney Channel Original Movie ''[[Den Brother]]''.
===Shake it Up and Fish Hooks Weekend=== On February 27 2011, Disney Channel Greece aired many new episodes of both shows.
===Candace Day=== On March 5, 2011, Disney Channel Greece aired episodes of [[Phineas and Ferb]] that focus on Candace.
===Fashion Week=== From March 7 to March 13, 2011, Disney Channel Greece premieres the most fashionable episodes of Disney channel shows.
